definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: Sure, we can go boating there and eat at the farm house.
sentences.chinese: 当然有啦，我们可以划船，还可以吃到农家菜啊。

sentences.english: There were other pleasant surprises, notably in rowing and roller-blading.
sentences.chinese: 同时划船和旱冰都得到了意外惊喜。

sentences.english: He rowed No.8 in the Cambridge crew.
sentences.chinese: 他是剑桥大学划船队的8号划手。

sentences.english: He spent around an hour rowing across the river, and also, his boat almost turned over for twice.
sentences.chinese: 他花了约一个小时划船过河，其间有两次几乎翻船。

sentences.english: They rowed a race against Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 他们与北京大学进行了划船比赛。

sentences.english: I rowed in the river and enjoyed it greatly.
What shall we take to boat?
It is now used primarily for leisure boating, walking, angling and cycling.
sentences.chinese: 现在主要用于休闲划船，散步，垂钓和骑车。

sentences.english: So together, he and the penguin would row to the south pole.
sentences.chinese: 于是，小男孩决定，他要和小企鹅一起划船到南极去。

sentences.english: He rowed up the canal looking for a place to dock the boat.
sentences.chinese: 他在运河里划船，寻找一个码头泊船。

sentences.english: The boat-race has been officially fixed for Thursday, April 2.
sentences.chinese: 划船比赛已正式定于4月2日星期四举行。

sentences.english: We'll take part in a regatta next month.
sentences.chinese: 下个月我们将参加一场划船比赛。

sentences.english: You might row a bout on the Pacific Lake.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以在太平湖上划船。

sentences.english: The Cambridge University rows against Oxford every year.
sentences.chinese: 剑桥大学每年与牛津大学进行划船比赛。

sentences.english: In the afternoon we went boating in the park.

definition: to tread water/to paddle or tramp in shallow water
stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
to scull (with a single oar, usually mounted on the stern of the boat)
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
